Task: Conduct Migration Readiness Assessment (MRA) - gather infrastructure inventory, application dependencies, network topology, and compliance requirements from HigherTech
Design VMware Cloud on AWS (VMC) SDDC architecture including NSX-T configuration, capacity planning, and cost modeling for US-West-2 region
Design VMware HCX deployment architecture including Network Extension configuration, bulk migration strategy for large VMs, and Layer 2 stretching topology with gateway swing plan
Design storage integration architecture including Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP NFS datastore attachment, archival data offload strategy, and vSAN optimization plan
Design security and firewall architecture including NSX-v to NSX-T rule translation, AWS Security Groups configuration, East-West traffic audit plan, and CloudAdmin privilege model implementation
Validate Direct Connect connectivity end-to-end including MTU (9001 bytes) testing, latency measurement, bandwidth verification, and intermediate device configuration review
Provision and configure VMware Cloud on AWS SDDC including vSphere cluster setup, vSAN configuration, NSX-T firewall rules, and AWS IAM roles for CloudAdmin access
Deploy and configure VMware HCX including on-premises and VMC connectors, Network Extension setup for critical subnets, bulk migration engine configuration, and performance tuning
Implement Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP including NFS datastore provisioning, attachment to VMC cluster, datastore affinity rules, and performance validation
Audit and translate firewall rules from NSX-v to NSX-T including documentation of all rules, mapping to AWS Security Groups, East-West traffic flow analysis, and exception handling
Identify and plan replacement for legacy host-level tools including backup agents, monitoring tools, and plugins; evaluate AWS-compatible alternatives and create migration plan

Execute pilot wave migration of 10 non-critical VMs including pre-migration cleanup, vMotion/bulk migration execution, validation testing, performance benchmarking, and documentation of lessons learned
Develop and test cutover procedures including gateway swing automation, firewall rule validation scripts, rollback procedures, and runbook documentation for production waves
Conduct security and compliance validation including firewall rule testing, access control verification, data integrity checks, audit trail validation, and compliance documentation
Manage project execution including stakeholder coordination, weekly technical alignment meetings, steering committee updates, risk tracking, timeline management, and deliverable coordination
Conduct licensing review and optimization including BYOL strategy validation with AWS specialist, cost modeling, license tracking setup, and compliance verification
